message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're willing to make a serious offer. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $180.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $160. This is my final counteroffer.
I appreciate your final counteroffer, but I'm still a bit too high on the budget. I'm willing to meet you at $155, which is the lowest I can go. Can you accept that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $155, Bob. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to my target price. I can offer it to you for $165. This is my last offer.
